title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 138 - Reimbursement Of Moving And Travel Expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 138 - Reimbursement Of Moving And Travel Expenses

State Regulations
§ 138.0 - Statement of policy
§ 138.1 - Eligibility for reimbursement upon transfer or reassignment
§ 138.2 - Employees not eligible for reimbursement upon transfer or reassignment
§ 138.3 - Eligibility for reimbursement upon promotion
§ 138.4 - General provisions governing eligibility for reimbursement
§ 138.5 - Moving and travel expenses eligible for reimbursement
§ 138.6 - Procedures to be followed for reimbursement
§ 138.7 - Repayment of monies advanced to the state
§ 138.8 - Exceptions
§ 138.9 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 138

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, § 6-b, as amd. by L. 1969, ch. 491

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
